title: Random Picker
description: Paste a list of candidates and draw winners instantly.

placeholder.items: Enter names or items separated by new lines or commas

helper.items: One item per line works best. Commas are also supported.

openGraph.title: Random Picker
openGraph.description: Free random picker for giveaways, team splits, and quick decisions. Paste your list and draw winners in seconds with instant copy support.
